InstallationÂ¶

Warning

To retain backwards compatibility with code written for django-any, django-whatever package shares the same namespace, so make sure to remove previous django_any installations if you have any.

  • Install the package with your python package manager:

    pip install django-whatever

  • Add 'django_any' to your INSTALLED_APPS setting (it’s not a typo, we use same app name as django_any):

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    "django_any",
    ...
)
